I gave you this warning but you would not listen. You defied the LORD's command and arrogantly went off into the hill country.
Jonathan answered Adonijah, “Hardly! Our lord, King David, has made Solomon king.
The kings who reigned in the land of Edom before the Israelites had kings were the following: Bela, son of Beor, the name of whose city was Dinhabah.
and many Israelites delighted in his religion; they sacrificed to idols and profaned the sabbath.
Then, warning him sternly, he dismissed him at once.
And how does this happen to me, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?
The next day he decided to go to Galilee, and he found Philip. And Jesus said to him, “Follow me.”
